meanings.definition: Involving unusual sexual behavior or preferences.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys reading kinkier romance novels.
meanings.sent2: The movie had a kinkier storyline than she expected.
meanings.sent3: His kinkier taste in music always surprises his friends.
meanings.sent4: Her kinkier fashion sense stood out in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The kinkier details of the painting caught her eye immediately.

meanings.definition: Showing or involving a strong or unusual interest in something.
meanings.sent1: He has a kinkier passion for vintage cars.
meanings.sent2: Her kinkier dedication to her work is admirable.
meanings.sent3: Their kinkier enthusiasm for the project was contagious.
meanings.sent4: The kinkier focus on detail made his presentation outstanding.
meanings.sent5: The kinkier commitment to the cause inspired others to join.
